text: Tamagri tamafuhe'za Juda nagama kna zampima mani'nazageta anazankura antahi muse nehuta kiza zokago ke huzmante'naze. Ana nehutma Juda naga'ma eme zamazeri havizama nehazageta, osuga'za huta musena nehuta, hazenkema eme zami'za zamazeri havizama nehazage'za tusi'a knazampima mani nazageta, tamagra osuga'za huta tamimiza runafage nehuta rantamagi eri'naze.
